summary: The Contoso Wireless product phone is a sleek, lightweight device with a long-lasting battery and powerful camera capabilities. It can be purchased with a variety of payment options, including major credit cards, PayPal and Apple Pay. There are also financing options available with 0% interest for up to 12 months. Customers can take advantage of discounts and promotions, including a 10% off promotion for signing up for the newsletter. The phone can be purchased in full or paid for in installments over 12 or 24 months. It also comes with a one-year limited warranty and customers can purchase an extended warranty at an additional cost.
